state: Welcome to another exciting episode of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, venture west. Once you do that, make an attempt to go north. Then, go north. Then, attempt to take a trip north. And then, make an effort to go to the east. Following that, take a trip east. And then, try to take a trip south. And then, make an attempt to head east. And then, head east. Then, try to travel north. Following that, go west. Then, head north. And then, go east. And then, recover the cauliflower from the board inside the laundry place. Alright, thanks! -= Laundromat =- You've entered a laundromat. You begin looking for stuff. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Laundromat =-0/1
next_state: -= Bathroom =- You find yourself in a bathroom. A typical kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room. You see a drawer. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Bathroom =-0/2

next_state: -= Closet =- Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the closet. An open display is here. What a letdown! The display is empty! You can see a toolbox. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting. The toolbox is empty, what a horrible day! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a shelf. You shudder, but continue examining the shelf. But there isn't a thing on it. There is an open door leading east. There is an open passageway leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. > -= Closet =-0/3
